title: Ramaraj
author: Ramaraj
content: Lady Ape Club (LAC) has debuted on StreamCoin’s dedicated NFT marketplace STRMNFT. Lady Ape Club (LAC), a collection of 10,000 unique NFTs, has chosen to mint on STRMNFT, StreamCoin’s dedicated NFT marketplace. This move makes the first massive minting campaign on STRMNFT.A lot of NFT collections struggle with the minting fee since most major blockchains do not scale well when there are a lot of minting requests being submitted. We believe that minting on STRMNFT for a change will allow us to capitalize on the budding ecosystem that StreamCoin is ushering forward. Read more on CoinQuora.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: I like apes. I like ladies too. When I heard about them apes with pussies, I went total ape shit crazy. 10000 NFT’s? These are rookie numbers. I’ll buy 5000 of them alone. If another NFT whale like me hits your store, you’ll run out of lady apes. You should work harder and manufacture more lady apes.NFT’s are the future. Good luck.
